p: Initial bacterial counts of MRSA for 10-fold diluted and 100-fold diluted 0.5 McFarland standard inoculums across triple experiment sets, presented in the Additional file 1 as Expt. 5 and Expt. 6, were (3.7 ± 0.9) × 10 6 CFU/mL and (3.8 ± 1.7) × 10 5 CFU/mL, respectively. At 10 min of VUV light disinfection, the bacteria of the 10-fold diluted and the 100-fold diluted 0.5 McFarland standard inoculums were completely inhibited, resulting in at least 5-log10 growth reduction (Fig. 2a and b).
